snippet: Roger Federer is the latest top player to have his Australian Open forecast clouded by injuries, withdrawing from the Qatar ExxonMobil Open in Doha.
abstract: Roger Federer is the latest top player to have his Australian Open forecast clouded by injuries, withdrawing from the Qatar ExxonMobil Open in Doha.
lead_paragraph: PERTH, Australia -Roger Federer is the latest top player to have his Australian Open forecast clouded by injuries, withdrawing from the Qatar ExxonMobil Open in Doha because of back spasms.

headline.main: Federer Forced Into Rare Withdrawal With Back Spasms
